text: Yeah w212 Merc is the easiest option there ticking the most boxes1. Space ✅2. Decent powertrain ✅3. Many units to choose from ✅4. Maintenance not bad if good unit is chosen ✅5. If you care for this  (I personally don't)  got Merc badge ✅
ConsDriving dynamics not the best as heavy car  cannot thrown into corners easily.But if you're only daily driving  good pick-up  smooth transmission and easy to maneuver

How to maintain your car and avoid expensive repairs👌🏻Let's be honest - maintenance and servicing is by far the least enjoyable part of car ownership. Here are the main components that you should be regularly checking on  and will require replacing every so often!👉🏻 Comment and share what other parts should car owners check regularly as well!➡️ Read ithere!
